It's not a journal, it's not a diary, he says of the Gerald Ford John McCain House notes.`` It is a set of working documents that I've never edited. In fact, most I've never reread.'' " You mentioned maps. If someone types in an address, they are looking for a map of where this address is. Keeping in line with our motivation to return the most relevant information as quickly as possible to our users, what that query deserves is a map and that's what we deliver.
